definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: a vein (or nerve) in the thigh (etym. dub.; on format. cf. Lag:BN 50; Ar. nasan0 appar. the portion of the principal vein of the leg which is in the thigh, vulg. sciatic vein, or (mod.) sciatic nerve and even sciatica, Lane:3033);—only [[גִּיד הַנׇּשֶׁה]] Ge 32:32 a the sinew of the thigh-vein (or thigh-nerve, [[אֲשֶׁר עַל־כַּף הַיׇּרֵח]]), cf. v:Ge 32:32 b.—On sacredness of thigh, cf. RS:Sem i. 360; 2nd ed. 380 We:Heid (2), 168.
